String.string: Do you want to talk to Axelle? Press .
She says you have to go to Legate Lam! I see him right over there. Let's go!
You can access the help menu by pressing . Give it a try.
So, we're hunting? Great! Click your enemy to attack. You donâ€™t even need to use your skills to defeat those ghilliedhus.
Look at the half-transparent map. You can check where you are, and where to advance your quests.
Use the System Settings menu to check and change your map shortcuts.
Click on the gear mark on your compass! You can set it to see only the information you need.
Ty using a teleport scroll!
You can buy teleport scrolls from merchants in villages!
Pay attention to your stamina. You can't fight well when you have low stamina.
No mindless hacking and slashing! Observe its attack pattern!
See those vines on your left? Let's go to the vines and press to start climbing.
Don't underestimate Vekas! Dodge its attack if you see its eyes glowing red. Understood?
Press and then press to climb to the top.
Try pressing Mouse 3 button, or NumLock key to run automatically.
Are you tired? Drink a speed potion for a temporary boost.
Gathering gives you raw materials for crafting and various buffs, so don't skip it!
Gathering gives you raw materials for crafting and various buffs, so don't skip it!
You cannot carry everything around with you. Visit a bank to empty your pack.
You've reached level 11! Now that you are a member of the Hands of Velika, you can improve your reputation with various factions.
Once you earn enough credits with the Hands of Velika, you can buy exclusive goods!
Use the riding skill in your inventory to learn a new riding skill. You can also drag your riding skill to your toolbar.
Use your different riding skills to summon mounts to travel faster. Doesn't that sound great?
I've found an artful gracebloom here! Come here, let's gather it with key.
Go to Verus and ask for an empty wooden barrel. You can make salted meat with the barrel.
Approach a runaway pigling, and use the pheromone dart to bring it back.
Got the flower? Good. Now let's press to open your inventory. Do you see a teleport scroll? Use it to return to Tower Base.
All villages have teleportals. Use them to go back to any destination you've already visited.
You're not walking all the way to Maon's Cabin, are you? Let's ride a mount!
Look. This is a city teleportal. You can move faster around Velika using this.
Press to open your skill window, and then try activating glyphs by using glyph points.
Combo attack grants you powerful effects. If you see chain skill on your screen, don't hesitate to press the space bar.
Something has arrived! Open Item Claim!
